page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT/TRANSPORT SURVEY.
page.content: Purpose of survey:To discover the nature of employment in the area and the distances and means of transport used to travel to and from work. Sample size 200( not all were completed)statistics were gathered by interview. As interviews were conducted during schoolhours one person was interviewed about all people of employment age in their household. The Questionaire: Interviewers filled in a questionaire for 8 people. They asked questions intended to be answered yes or no with the exception of distance travelled to work Categories: some difficulty was encountered in deciding upon categories of employmen. The categories selected are shown on the following page.
